item.description: Really nice..

item.title: Comment on Failed Feelings by Endlessly exciting girl
item.dc:creator: Endlessly exciting girl
item.description:
Still, he wants her to know The feelings he failed to show Weren’t merely love or lust Four letter words could never do just
The above lines are just Wowww..... Keep it up
item.content:encoded:
Still, he wants her to know
The feelings he failed to show
Weren’t merely love or lust
Four letter words could never do just

The above lines are just Wowww…..
Keep it up

item.title: Comment on Cloudseeker by Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
hey, Loved it.. **Far away from the crowd From everything that’s loud Still, he stood Gazing at the snowy cloud**
loved these lines. You really are a creative guy. who seeks answers in the clouds.
item.content:encoded:
hey, Loved it..
**Far away from the crowd
From everything that’s loud
Still, he stood
Gazing at the snowy cloud**

loved these lines. You really are a creative guy. who seeks answers in the clouds.

item.title: Comment on The Best Sitcom: Why should you watch FRIENDS? by JM
item.dc:creator: JM
item.description: It's a pity you don't have a donate button! I'd without a doubt donate to this superb blog! I suppose for now i'll settle for bookmarking and adding your RSS feed to my Google account. I look forward to new updates and will talk about this blog with my Facebook group. Talk soon!
item.content:encoded:
It’s a pity you don’t have a donate button! I’d without a doubt donate
to this superb blog! I suppose for now i’ll settle for bookmarking and
adding your RSS feed to my Google account. I look forward to new updates and will talk about this blog with my Facebook group.
Talk soon!
